title: Let Me Love You
description: A friends-to-lovers sports romance…Jaylinn McCormick is determined to forget that terrifying night that left her feeling broken and tainted. There is one person who can make her feel whole again, but he is hell bent on keeping her at arm’s length. Cooper Cahill has loved Jaylinn for years, even more than his love for baseball. He wants nothing more than to put all her pieces back together, but he deems himself unworthy. Does Cooper have what it takes to make Jaylinn’s heart safe or will he miss the chance and strike out?
author: Megan   Smith
